729387f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Court Place
729387f-a.text:
Place.  Eichaond Eead, at the S.E. oorner of Court
June 16, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729387f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

729386f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Court Place
729386f-a.text:
Richmond Road, south side, between Court Place and
St. Patricks Place, showing the rear of the old John F.
Schwiebert Wagon Works. Mr. Sperr states that this was formerly
a Dutch Reformed Church.
May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONIS
729386f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

729385f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Court Place
729385f-b.text:
Richmond Road, south side, between Court Place
and St. Patricks Place, showing the old John F. Schwie-
bert Richmond Wagon Works. Mr. P. L. Sperr states
that the brick building was formerly a Dutch Reformed
Church.
June 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
A rear view of the brick building, at a later date.
May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
A rear view of the frame building, looking toward
Richmond Road.
May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
